{"url": "https://windowsreport.com/microsoft-releases-fix-for-the-0x8002802b-error-on-windows-11s-kb5039302/", "title": "Microsoft releases fix for the 0x8002802B error on Windows 11's KB5039302", "body": "Read our disclosure page to find out how can you help Windows Report sustain the editorial team Read more\n\nIn the busy realm of technology, where adjustments and fixes are as regular as weather changes, Microsoft recently faced some unexpected problems with its latest Windows 11 update known as KB5039302.\n\nThis non-security update, optional to install and meant to improve user experience, has caused more issues than expected. It has been a headache for users and IT admins, from messing up the taskbar functioning to causing chaos in whole systems.\n\nAnd in case you were thinking things couldn't possibly deteriorate further, Microsoft has delivered another shocker: an annoying bug influencing the Windows Update Agent API, or WUA for short. In KB5039302, this issue is recognized by the error code 0x8002802B and bears the name \"TYPE_E_ELEMENTNOTFOUND.\"\n\nAfter installing the June 2024 Windows preview update, released June 25, 2024 (KB5039302) and later updates, you might face issues using Windows Update Agent API (WUA) from your script (PowerShell, VBScript, etc.) while searching for Windows updates. Due to this issue, you might get an empty result when querying the properties of IUpdate objects present in the IUpdateCollection and error code 0x8002802B (TYPE_E_ELEMENTNOTFOUND) when calling methods on the object from your script.\n\nNow you could think, \"What's so significant about this mistake?\" Essentially, it affects scripts that use PowerShell or VBScript to communicate with the API. When these scripts query specific object properties, they return empty results because of the error. But some good news: Microsoft released a fix and made it available through the Known Issue Rollback feature. This solution, which works most of the time, may require IT administrators to apply special Group Policies for complete resolution.\n\nThis issue is resolved using Known Issue Rollback (KIR). IT administrators can resolve this issue by installing and configuring the special Group Policy listed below. The special Group Policy can be found in Computer Configuration -> Administrative Templates -> <Group Policy name listed below>.\n\nFor those who may be puzzled by the term Known Issue Rollback, it is a characteristic of Microsoft that enables them to reverse troublesome alterations from afar, as they have done with the Taskbar issue in Windows 11, last month. Users don't need to perform any action to complete this process. Still, suppose the automatic remedy doesn't work as intended in certain situations. In that case, an elaborate direction exists on implementing and setting up the Group Policy required to eliminate this bug.\n\nThe error 0x8002802B on KB5039302 might be irritating, but it isn't likely to keep organizations that depend on Windows Automatic Updates or normal home users awake. Instead, this issue is more of an annoyance for people who handle their updates manually or employ scripts to automate things.", "source": {"uri": "windowsreport.com", "dataType": "news", "title": "Windows Report | Error-free Tech Life"}, "authors": [{"uri": "flavius_floare@windowsreport.com", "name": "Flavius Floare", "type": "author", "isAgency": false}], "image": "https://cdn.windowsreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/400-million-2024-07-12T114420.526-1.jpg", "eventUri": "eng-9736998", "sentiment": -0.1215686274509804, "wgt": 459003091, "relevance": 38}

{"url": "https://gamerant.com/house-of-the-dragon-hotd-games-daemon-targaryen-would-play/", "title": "House Of The Dragon: 5 Video Games Daemon Targaryen Would Play", "body": "Highlights\n\nDaemon Targaryen from House of the Dragon would enjoy playing games like Crusader Kings 3 with a Game of Thrones mod for more rebellion fun. House Flipper could help Daemon practice restoring Harrenhal, the ruined castle he tries to fix in Season 2 of the show. Hades would be a challenge for Daemon because of its fast-paced combat.\n\nDaemon Targaryen, the Rogue Prince and one of the leading stars of House of the Dragon, is a complicated character, to say the least, and it's always hard to know what he will do next. One thing that is for certain, however, is that he is thoroughly compelling to watch, at least from a safe distance with the knowledge that his actions are merely the work of fiction.\n\nRelated\n\nHouse of the Dragon: 10 Best Daemon Targaryen Quotes\n\nDaemon Targaryen is the source of many memorable lines in House of the Dragon. Here are his best quotes in the series so far.\n\nIn Season 2 of House of the Dragon, the disputed king consort has much more time on his hands than usual, and it's interesting to think about what video games Daemon Targaryen would play during his downtime at Harrenhal if he was given the chance. With a love for dragons and adrenaline-inducing violence, there are plenty of great options available to him, but Daemon would likely get the most enjoyment out of these particular titles.\n\n5 Crusader Kings 3\n\nDaemon Would Enjoy The Schemes & Wars Of CK3, Especially With The Game Of Thrones Mod\n\nCrusader Kings 3\n\nPlatform(s) PS5 , Xbox Series X , Xbox Series S , PC\n\nReleased September 1, 2020\n\nDeveloper(s) Paradox Interactive\n\nGenre(s) RPG , Grand Strategy\n\nWhile Daemon can certainly get bored with the tedious aspects of ruling, there's no denying that he loves scheming and leading armies into war, two things that Crusader Kings 3 is known for. In this grand strategy game, players take on the role of a medieval ruler, living out their personal lives while hopefully steering their realm to greater heights. Upon death, players take over as their ruler's heir, and upon succession, things can get almost as messy as the Dance of the Dragons.\n\nWar is naturally a big part of the game, and although diplomacy is another option, Daemon would be much more interested in the scheme system that sees players plot to have other characters killed or kidnapped. What makes this game so perfect for the Rogue Prince is the existence of a Game of Thrones mod, CK3 AGOT, which will soon see the addition of dragons and a new start date set during the first few episodes of House of the Dragon. If Daemon could play Crusader Kings 3 with this mod, he'd be able to see what would have happened if he'd rebelled against his brother.\n\n4 House Flipper\n\nWould Be Good Practice For Daemon's Attempt To Restore Harrenhal\n\nHouse Flipper\n\nPlatform(s) Android , iOS , PS4 , Switch , Xbox One\n\nReleased May 17, 2018\n\nDeveloper Empyrean, Frozen District\n\nGenre(s) Simulation\n\nIn Season 2 of House of the Dragon, Daemon lingers at Harrenhal, a crumbling ruin of a castle that was burned down by his own ancestor. Frustrated by the constant leaks and with nothing else to do, Daemon sets about trying to restore this once-great castle and even gets his own hands dirty in the process.\n\nRelated\n\nHouse Of The Dragon: 8 Most Complex Character Relationships\n\nNot all character relationships in House of the Dragon are straightforward and easy to understand. Here are the most complex ones showcased so far.\n\nThis is where House Flipper comes in, as it is a game all about purchasing abandoned homes and restoring them. Players can clean, paint, knock down walls, build new ones, install air conditioning, and much more. With enough expertise, players will be able to sell their renovated house for much more than they bought it for, before moving onto a new property. Perhaps the relaxing nature of this game could help Daemon take the edge off.\n\n3 Hades\n\nDaemon Would Relish The Challenge Of Hades & Enjoy The Fast-Paced Combat\n\nHades\n\nPlatform(s) PS4 , PS5 , Xbox One , Xbox Series X , Xbox Series S , Switch , PC\n\nReleased September 17, 2020\n\nDeveloper(s) Supergiant Games\n\nGenre(s) Action RPG , Roguelite\n\nDaemon Targaryen is a man who fears no one and, as such, would likely enjoy defying the god of death in Hades. This roguelike action RPG has all the challenges the Targaryen prince seeks, and it would be interesting to see if his prowess on the battlefield could translate to video games that demand such skill.\n\nIn this critically acclaimed game, players take on the role of the Prince of the Underworld, Zagreus, and at times, the Olympian gods bestow powers upon him. With Targaryens often said to be closer to gods than men, Zagreus certainly seems to be a fitting protagonist for Daemon to play as. Lastly, Hades has a certain edginess to it that Daemon could resonate with, even if he himself doesn't realize it.\n\n2 Doom (2016)\n\nDaemon Would Enjoy The Fast Paced Violence Of Doom\n\nDOOM (2016)\n\nPlatform(s) PC , PS4 , Switch , Xbox One\n\nReleased May 13, 2016\n\nDeveloper(s) id Software\n\nGenre(s) FPS\n\nIf there's one franchise that could distract Daemon from the haunted halls of Harrenhal and his messed-up dreams, it has to be the Doom series, and what better title is there to start with than the 2016 installment, simply known as Doom? With violence, gore, and heavy metal music all delivered at full-throttle speeds, few things could be better at drowning out the whispers that plague Daemon's sleep.\n\nRelated\n\nHouse Of The Dragon: 8 Most Devastating Betrayals\n\nBackstabbing almost seems like a pastime for certain characters in House of the Dragon, but certain betrayals have been more devastating than others.\n\nArmed with a shotgun in place of his iconic sword, Dark Sister, Daemon could have endless fun slaughtering vast hordes of demons in a game that encourages players to never stop running or firing.\n\n1 Century: Age Of Ashes\n\nA PVP Dragon Riding Game Where Daemon Could Dominate\n\nCentury: Age of Ashes\n\nPlatform(s) Microsoft Windows , PS5 , PS4 , Xbox One , Xbox Series X , Xbox Series S , iOS , Android\n\nReleased November 18, 2021\n\nDeveloper(s) Playwing\n\nGenre(s) Free-to-Play , Indie Games , Action , Shooter , Racing\n\nIf there's one thing Daemon Targaryen loves more than anything else, it's dragons. As the rider of the Blood Wyrm Caraxes and an ever-present visitor to the Dragonmont, where he is the first to find new clutches of eggs, Daemon cannot get enough of these creatures.\n\nThis is why games that allow players to ride dragons are a natural fit for the Rogue Prince, and out of these, the best is arguably Century: Age of Ashes. This is a competitive team-based PVP game dedicated entirely to aerial dragon fights, with players being able to twist and turn in the air at freighting speeds to avoid castle towers and oncoming dragon fire alike. There are different classes of dragons to ride with varying skills, lots of customization, and best of all, for a man who does not feel like borrowing money from his wife and queen, the game is free-to-play.\n\nMore\n\nHouse Of The Dragon: 7 Underutilized Characters\n\nHouse of The Dragon has a large cast of interesting characters. However, some of them end up underutilized or sidelined.", "source": {"uri": "gamerant.com", "dataType": "news", "title": "Game Rant"}, "authors": [{"uri": "joe_grantham@gamerant.com", "name": "Joe Grantham", "type": "author", "isAgency": false}], "image": "https://static0.gamerantimages.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/house-of-the-dragon-video-games-daemon-targaryen-would-play.jpg", "eventUri": "eng-9737275", "sentiment": 0.3019607843137255, "wgt": 459002825, "relevance": 1}

{"url": "https://www.windowslatest.com/2024/07/18/windows-11-kb5040442-issues-update-fails-to-install-causes-other-problems/", "title": "Windows 11 KB5040442 issues: update fails to install, causes other problems", "body": "You're not alone if you can't download or install Windows 11 KB5040442 due to 0x80d02002, 0x800f081f, 0x80073cf3, or other errors. In addition, if you've already installed the July 9 cumulative update, some of you might run into other problems, including slow performance.\n\nKB5040442 is a mandatory update, which is why Windows Update may try to download and install it automatically whether or not you like it. As reported by users on our forums, some people observed that Windows 11 tried to install the July 9 cumulative update three times, each time reporting an 0x80d02002 error.\n\nOne user then downloaded the update manually from the Microsoft Catalog and tried to install it. It was very slow to start installing, eventually grinding to a halt. Windows Update records that it 'Requires a restart to finish installing'. Unfortunately, restarting the computer makes no difference.\n\n\"2024-07 Cumulative Update for Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems (KB5040442) is on installing - 0% for ages but nothing happens. I have cleaned up the update folder, made a scan on the drive, etc,\" one of the affected users noted in a Feedback Hub post.\n\nMultiple reports on Feedback Hub seem to indicate an installation problem with KB5040442 Patch Tuesday. However, in our tests, Windows Latest observed that the update smoothly installs when we use the Microsoft Update Catalog.\n\nIf you're unable to download or install the patch, I recommend trying these steps:\n\nUnlike Windows Update, .msu installation will not fail, and Windows will smoothly apply the Patch Tuesday update.\n\nBut is that all? It turns out Windows 11 KB5040442 has other issues. According to posts on our forums, there are several other problems, including reports of constant boot loops or getting stuck in repair mode, which ends in a blue screen.\n\nOn Reddit, others have also flagged some users' PCs and virtual machines become unusable (\"bricked\") after the update, but this seems to be a rare issue.\n\nHere's the full list of bugs reported in the update:\n\nThankfully, it is possible to pause the updates from Settings > Windows Update > Pause updates for seven days.\n\nMicrosoft has yet to acknowledge the reports. How's your experience with the July 2024 Patch Tuesday? {"url": "https://www.computable.nl/2024/07/18/ik-heb-bijgedragen-aan-de-toekomst-van-windows/", "title": "'Ik heb bijgedragen aan de toekomst van Windows' - Computable.nl", "body": "Me, myself & I(T) - Hoe klim je van onderaan de it-ladder in veertien jaar op naar een rol als principal product manager Ã©n community director op het hoofdkantoor van Microsoft in de Verenigde Staten? We vragen het Christiaan Brinkhoff, die momenteel deze rol bij de softwareleverancier uit Redmond, Washington bekleedt. 'De hoeveelheid kansen in Redmond is ongelimiteerd!'\n\nZes jaar werkt Brinkhoff inmiddels voor Microsoft. Eerst drie jaar vanuit Nederland en de laatste drie jaar vanuit Redmond. Het zijn zes jaren die eigenlijk nu al een soort kroon op de carriÃ¨re van hem zijn, want Microsoft loopt als een rode draad door zijn loopbaan. OkÃ©, Brinkhoff heeft zich ook met Citrix- en Vmware-technologie bezig gehouden, maar het is toch Microsoft dat steevast op zijn cv is terug te vinden.\n\nHet begon allemaal aan de vakschool Rijn IJssel in Arnhem, waar Brinkhoff de studie IT-management volgde, versneld in twee jaar natuurlijk. 'Na mijn school ben ik direct overgegaan op het behalen van meerdere Microsoft-certificeringen (MCSE, MCSA, Cloud Architect, et cetera) omtrent Windows en Cloud (Azure) om mij klaar te stomen voor de cloudtransitie in de periode 2010 - 2012. Praktijkervaring telt uiteindelijk meer mee als theorie. Veel kennis die je opdoet op school is vaak niet hetgeen wat je in de praktijk direct kan gebruiken.'\n\nWerkervaring was dus volgens Brinkhoff dÃ© sleutel naar een lange en vooral succesvolle carriÃ¨re. 'Ik ben in 2010 onderaan de it-ladder begonnen als it-servicedesk engineer voor een outsource-bedrijf in Gelderland. Vanuit deze rol ben ik naar medior en senior it systems engineer doorgegroeid. Alles draaide om cloud en Windows in mijn loondienst. Uiteindelijk ben ik in 2017 als zelfstandige freelance cloudarchitect aan de slag te gaan. Na een jaar ben ik vanuit Nederland als cloudarchitect en productevangelist gaan werken voor de Amerikaanse softwarestartup FSLogix, om uiteindelijk in 2018 overgenomen te worden door Microsoft.'\n\nMicrosoft, en dan met name cloud computing, vormen dus een rode draad in de carriÃ¨re van Brinkhoff. Hoe zie hij zelf dat zijn carriÃ¨re zich ontwikkeld heeft? 'Sinds de start van mijn carriÃ¨re ben ik gefascineerd geweest van cloud computing en virtualisatie. Ik vond het erg interessant om een computer te kunnen gebruiken zonder er fysiek voor te moeten zitten, vanuit bijvoorbeeld een datacenter. Deze passie, kennis en discipline heeft me geholpen naar waar ik nu sta binnen Microsoft, waar mijn ervaring optimaal benut kan worden.'\n\nMaar voordat we het over Microsoft gaan hebben, eerst even over het voorliggende deel van Brinkhoffs carriÃ¨re. Zo heeft hij dus als zelfstandige gewerkt en koos hij ervoor om bij een startup aan de slag te gaan. Laten we met de eerste beginnen, want hoe kijkt hij terug op zijn periode als (freelance) consultant? En wat was het beste advies dat hij ooit gegeven heeft? 'Ik kijk terug op een leuke en leerzame periode. Vooral de vrijheid om zelf je projecten te kiezen deed me erg goed. Mijn beste advies heeft eigenlijk te maken met de vorm 'freelancen'. Want ga niet freelancen vanwege de extra inkomsten, maar doe dit vooral om je qua mogelijkheden te verbeteren in je vakgebied. Voor mij resulteerde dit in de kans om voor een Amerikaanse startup aan de slag te gaan, iets dat ik als freelancer nooit zou kunnen. Mijn keuze om als consultant snel richting cloud/Azure te bewegen terwijl veel bedrijven dit nog niet deden, heeft mijn carriÃ¨re erg doen versnellen.'\n\nEn dat brengt ons direct bij zijn volgende ervaring, het werken bij FSLogix. Waarom ging je bij/voor een startup werken? Wat heeft deze stap jou uiteindelijk gebracht? Brinkhoff: 'No guts no glory, is iets wat ik van jongs af aan altijd heb meegekregen. Ik doe liever dingen waar ik later op kan terug kijken onder het mom dat ik het heb geprobeerd in plaats van terugkijken op dingen die ik niet heb gedaan. Ik zat vast in mijn mogelijkheden binnen het bedrijfsleven, en mijn manager was niet echt behulpzaam in mijn groei. Ik heb voor mijzelf gekozen en dat heeft uiteindelijk heel goed uitgepakt.'\n\n'Ik heb bijgedragen aan de toekomst van het grote Windows'\n\nDie startup groeide, en groeide, en werd uiteindelijk overgenomen door niemand minder dan Microsoft. Hoe keek jij tegen die overname aan? En wat bracht die overgang jou uiteindelijk? 'Als eerste dacht ik, dit is geweldig! Maar ook dacht ik, ga ik nu mijn baan en leuke collega's verliezen?' Brinkhoff twijfelde dus wel over de overname, maar het kwam goed. 'Het is uiteindelijk niet zo verlopen. Ik had sinds de dag van de aankondiging er erg zin in en kon niet wachten om voor Microsoft te gaan werken. Ik heb het geluk gehad dat ik na de overname direct, in 2018, aan een nieuw product, Azure Virtual Desktop, kon gaan werken. Mijn taak was om in de global black belt-rol binnen Microsoft dit product naar de emea-markt te brengen. Een erg leuke en unieke rol die mij uiteindelijk heeft doen besluiten om als productmanager te gaan werken. Zodoende ben ik vanaf de beginfase, wanneer het alleen nog maar zichtbaar is in documenten en Visio-architectuurtekeningen, betrokken geweest totdat het later, in 2021, als Windows 365 zou worden uitgebracht. Zodoende heb ik bijgedragen aan de toekomst van het grote Windows.'\n\nNu was de overstap naar Microsoft natuurlijk niet een bewuste keuze voor Brinkhoff, maar was dit wel een stap die hij voor zichzelf voor ogen had? Of was het misschien een 'noodzakelijk kwaad'? Of was het gezien je kennis en ervaring op Microsoft-gebied juist een droom die uitkwam? 'In het begin van mijn carriÃ¨re was het mijn droom om een eigen blog te hebben en daarop kennis te delen. Werken voor Microsoft kwam later, maar maakte dit wel mogelijk. Echter heb ik nooit bij Microsoft gesolliciteerd. Sommige dingen in het leven komen gewoon op je pad naarmate je ergens presteert of naar toe beweegt. Microsoft bood mij een contract aan vanwege mijn markt- en productkennis, wat op dat moment nodig was om het product naar een hoger niveau te tillen en om het te laten aansluiten bij de wensen van bedrijven.'\n\nBrinkhoff kwam dus uiteindelijk bij Microsoft in dienst. Hoe zagen deze afgelopen zes jaar er voor jou uit en hoe heb jij je binnen Microsoft weten te ontwikkelen? 'Ik begon bij Microsoft als incubator pre-sales black belt, om het product Azure Virtual Desktop op de markt te brengen. Zie het als een rol waarbij je zowel engineering, sales als alle Microsoft-locaties over de wereld van productinformatie moet voorzien. Dat was een erg leuke en dynamische rol. Dit zit nog steeds erg aan de voorzijde van een product en lijkt op wat ik voorheen bij FSLogix deed, de startup die door Microsoft werd overgenomen. Ik zocht naar nieuwe uitdagingen en ik wilde al langer aan de voorzijde van een productontwerp actief zijn. Dit heeft er uiteindelijk toe geleid dat ik als productmanager aan de slag ben gegaan, om Windows 365 als product van strategisch document richting een tastbaar product te brengen. Hier komt een hoop bij kijken, van zowel marketing, business, sales tot productmanagement zelf. Dit is waar ik me het beste op mijn plek voel en wat ik vandaag de dag nog steeds doe. Ik ben goed in het bouwen van nieuwe producten die over grote andere producten en delen van Microsoft gaan. Denk hierbij aan Surface, Windows maar ook zeker ai.'\n\nToch betekent werken voor Microsoft niet dat je ook fysiek aanwezig moet zijn op het hoofdkantoor in Redmond (VS). Toch koos je er drie jaar geleden voor om daar te gaan werken. Waarom? 'Wie wil er nu niet in het hart van de it werken? In Redmond gebeurt bijna alles, en de hoeveelheid kansen is ongelimiteerd! De overstap ging erg gemakkelijk, al is afscheid nemen van ouders, grootouders en vrienden natuurlijk wel erg lastig. Maar gelukkig is er WhatsApp, Facebook, Skype et cetera om in contact te blijven. Daarnaast gaan we jaarlijks met het gezin terug om voor twee weken in Nederland te verblijven.'\n\n'Ai brengt Windows naar Apple Mac, iPad en Android-tablet'\n\nOok bij Microsoft heeft Brinkhoff inmiddels stappen gemaakt en bekleedt hij nu de functie van principal product manager, community director, Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop. Een mond vol. Wat houdt deze rol in en wat zijn jouw meest voorkomende werkzaamheden? 'Ik ben nu verantwoordelijk voor het design en de strategie rondom migratie, ai en voorheen ook Windows-integraties, zoals Windows 365 Boot & Switch. Qua werk moet je dan voornamelijk denken aan het schrijven van strategiedocumenten die samenvatten hoe het product eruit moet zien via mocks/designs van een echt uitziend product, de impact en de hoeveelheid werk die het gaat kosten om het te bouwen. De meeste energie krijg ik van positieve reacties van klanten die het product gebruiken die jij met het team hebt gebouwd. Niets gaat boven bedrijven blij te zien met iets waar jij onderdeel van bent.'\n\nJe houdt je nu bezig met Windows Ã©n ai. Hoe verhouden die twee zich tot elkaar? Brinkhoff: 'Windows als besturingssysteem kennen we allemaal, in de toekomst zul je nog meer op cloud gebaseerde Windows-oplossingen gaan zien gecombineerd met ai. Denk hierbij aan een andere manier van interactie met het besturingssysteem via ai, ongelimiteerde performance, maar ook het gebruik van ai en Windows vanaf andere platformen, zoals Windows vanaf een Apple Mac, iPad of Android-tablet.'\n\nDat klinkt natuurlijk zeer verrassend, Windows op je iPad! Maar dat is niet het enige waar ai Microsoft brengt. Wat kunnen we op dit vlak nog meer verwachten? 'Ik kan natuurlijk niet alles delen, maar verwacht vooral veel meer eindgebruiker-gerichte ai-verbeteringen die je nog productiever maken dan bijvoorbeeld Copilot en ChatGPT vandaag de dag al doen. Onze ai zal je creativiteit nog meer een boost geven en het werk dat je verricht wordt nog kwalitatiever zonder er meer tijd aan te besteden! En daar blijft het niet bij, want ik kijk erg uit naar de ontwikkelingen op het gebied van virtual reality en hoe dit remote werken nog meer gaat verbeteren. Voornamelijk binnen Microsoft Teams-meetings denk ik dat dit een grote personal touch kan gaan opleveren het gebied van samenwerken. Zeker als je dit combineert met ai of Copilot.'\n\nEn dan tot slot. Je hebt zelf een prachtig pad doorlopen om te groeien van een young professional naar een vooraanstaande internationale positie bij Microsoft. Wat is jouw advies voor de huidige, ambitieuze young professionals in de markt? 'Ga ervoor! Denk niet dat wat een ander al doet iets is wat jij niet zou moeten doen. Volg je eigen pad. Zoek iets binnen de it waar je passie voor hebt en zorg dat je alles te weten komt om je te onderscheiden als expert. Mensen respecteren het zeer als je moeite doet om extra kennis te delen zodat we er allemaal beter van worden. Als je dromen hebt, kan je deze bereiken door er alles voor te geven, met een gezonde dosis aan discipline.'", "source": {"uri": "computable.nl", "dataType": "news", "title": "Computable"}, "authors": [{"uri": "sander_hulsman@computable.nl", "name": "Sander Hulsman", "type": "author", "isAgency": false}], "image": "https://www.computable.nl/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Christiaan-Brinkhoff-2.jpg", "eventUri": null, "sentiment": null, "wgt": 459002420, "relevance": 50}

ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ HarmonyOS Next Ğ½ĞµÑ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ½ĞµÑ‚, ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ° Ğ½ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ·Ñ.\n\nĞ”Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ² Ñ†ĞµĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğº HarmonyOS Next Ñƒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ° Ğ½ĞµÑ‚ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ° - Ñ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Huawei Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞµĞµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ° Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ ĞŸĞ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ¾Ñ„Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ½ĞµĞµ. ĞšĞ°Ğº Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑˆĞµÑ‚ Tom's Hardware, Ğ² ĞµĞµ Ğ²Ğ½ĞµÑˆĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ»ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ½ĞµĞ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ñ Apple macOS, Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²ÑƒÑ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑŒ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ´Ğ¾Ğº-Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ»ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ° 10% Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸ ÑĞºÑ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°. ĞœĞµĞ¶Ğ´Ñƒ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼, Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ² Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒÑ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ĞĞ¡, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚, Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¸Ñ… ÑĞ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ»Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ¼ÑƒĞ¼ ÑÑ…Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ñ Windows.\n\nĞ—Ğ° Ğ¿ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ»ĞµÑ‚ ÑĞ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑÑƒÑ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ°Ñ HarmonyOS Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Android Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸Ğ¸ 4.2 (Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ»ÑŒ 2024 Ğ³.), Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ° ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ. Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾ HarmonyOS Next, Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğº Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñƒ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ğ° Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑŒ Ğ² Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±ĞµÑ‚Ğ°-ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ñ€ĞºĞµ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ², Ğ²Ñ‹ÑˆĞµĞ´ÑˆĞµĞ¹ Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ†Ğµ Ğ¸ÑĞ½Ñ 2024 Ğ³.\n\nĞ—Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ ĞšĞĞ  Ğ² ÑĞµĞ³Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… ĞĞ¡, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ HarmonyOS Ğ¸ ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ğ±Ğ°Ğ» Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²ÑÑ‚ Android Ğ¸ iOS, Ğ²Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ¼, ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ² ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğµ. ĞŸĞ¾ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Tom's Hardware, Ğ·Ğ° Ğ¿ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ»ĞµÑ‚, Ñ ÑƒÑ‡ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ, HarmonyOS Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ»Ğ° Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑŒ 16% Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ½ĞºĞ° ÑĞ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ñ„Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ².\n\nĞ’Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ ÑĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ HarmonyOS Next Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿ÑŒÑÑ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ€ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ ĞšĞĞ . ĞšĞ°Ğº Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑˆĞµÑ‚ Tom's Hardware, Huawei, Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾, Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ° Ğ±Ñ‹ ÑĞ¾ÑÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑƒÑĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞµ HarmonyOS Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ², Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñƒ ĞºĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¹, Ñ€ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ…, Ğ½Ğ° Ğ½ĞµĞµ ÑĞ¾Ğ²ÑĞµĞ¼ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‹.\n\nĞ’ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ¨ÑĞ½ÑŒÑ‡Ğ¶ÑĞ½Ñ, Ğ¼ĞµĞ³Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑĞ°, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑĞ²ÑĞ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ“Ğ¾Ğ½ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ³ Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ, Ğ½ĞµĞ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ Ñ€ĞµĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ \"ĞŸĞ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¨ÑĞ½ÑŒÑ‡Ğ¶ÑĞ½Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞ¸ ÑĞ¾Ğ±ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ HarmonyOS Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºÑ€Ñ‹Ñ‚Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¸ÑÑ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ² 2024 Ğ³.\". Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ²ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑƒÑĞºĞ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞ¸ ÑĞ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ¸ ĞµĞµ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ. ĞĞ´Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ†ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹ - Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ²ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ² Ğ¸Ğ· ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ° Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğµ HarmonyOS Ğ´Ğ¾ 10% Ğ´Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ†Ğ° 2024 Ğ³.\n\nĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ° Huawei, Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ»ĞµÑÑ‚ Ğ´ĞµĞ½ĞµĞ³ Ğ½Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºÑƒ HarmonyOS. ĞŸĞ¾ Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼, ÑÑƒĞ¼Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ², Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ñ‹, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ÑŒ 3 Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ½. {"url": "https://www.neowin.net/news/surface-pro-8-gets-big-firmware-update-with-multiple-improvements-and-fixes/", "title": "Surface Pro 8 gets big firmware update with multiple improvements and fixes", "body": "Microsoft has fully released a new firmware update for the eighth-generation Surface Pro. This Intel-based Windows tablet received connectivity improvements, better compatibility with the Surface Thunderbolt 4 Dock, Surface Slim Pen auto-pairing, and fixes for camera performance issues when low on storage.\n\nHere is the official changelog:\n\nThe following update is available for Surface Pro 8 devices running Windows 10 October 2022 Update, Version 22H2, or greater.\n\nImproves Wi-Fi connectivity and addresses concerns regarding Bluetooth pairing when device is on standby.\n\nImproves interoperability with the Surface Thunderbolt 4 Dock by resolving issues that were preventing the system from detecting audio devices.\n\nEnables auto-pairing of the Slim pen and improves auto binding to provide a seamless workflow.\n\nImproves device security by updating certificate processes for better protection and easier authentication.\n\nAddresses an issue affecting the camera's performance caused by insufficient memory or storage capacity.\n\nYou can find the complete list (a lengthy one) of new drivers in the Surface Pro 8's July 2024 firmware update in the official documentation.\n\nHere is extra information about the release:\n\nSupported Configurations Surface Pro 8 Supported Windows Versions Windows 10 version 22H2 and newer\n\nWindows 11 version 22H2 and newer How to get the update Windows Update\n\nSurface Support website (manual installation) Update Size 742 MB (manual installation only) Additional Steps The update does not require extra steps before or after installation Known Issues The update does not contain any known issues\n\nAlthough the eighth-generation Surface Pro tablet is now two-generation old (three, if you count the Surface Pro 10 for Business), it will remain supported for quite a few years from now. Microsoft says the Surface Pro 8 has a six-year lifecycle, which means it will reach the end of support on October 5, 2027, alongside the Surface Laptop Studio, Surface Go 3, and the Surface Pro X Wi-Fi.", "source": {"uri": "neowin.net", "dataType": "news", "title": "Neowin"}, "authors": [{"uri": "taras_buria@neowin.net", "name": "Taras Buria", "type": "author", "isAgency": false}], "image": "https://cdn.neowin.com/news/images/uploaded/2021/09/1632323910_pro_8_(3)_story.jpg", "eventUri": null, "sentiment": 0.3960784313725489, "wgt": 459002058, "relevance": 26}

ĞŸĞ»ÑÑ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°, Ñ Ğ¾Ñ†ĞµĞ½ĞºĞ° TrustPilot 98% ĞÑ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ Ğ¸ 24/7 ĞµĞºÑĞ¿ĞµÑ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµÑ…Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´Ñ€ÑŠĞ¶ĞºĞ°, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğµ ÑƒĞ²ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ² ĞºĞ°Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ‚Ğ°, ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¾ ĞºÑƒĞ¿ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğµ.\n\nGodeal24 Ğ¾Ğ±ĞµÑ‰Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° 24/7 Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„ĞµÑĞ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµÑ…Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´Ñ€ÑŠĞ¶ĞºĞ°, Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ±ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ±ÑĞ»ÑƒĞ¶Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¸ Ñ‡Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ‚Ğ° Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»ĞµĞ¼Ğ¸!\n\nĞ¡Ğ²ÑŠÑ€Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ ÑĞµ Ñ Godeal24: [email protected]", "source": {"uri": "informiran.net", "dataType": "news", "title": "Informiran.net"}, "authors": [{"uri": "ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°_Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°@informiran.net", "name": "ĞšĞ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¤Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°", "type": "author", "isAgency": false}], "image": "https://www.informiran.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Ğ›ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ°-Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ±Ğ°-Ğ½Ğ°-Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞ½-Windows-Ğ¸-Office-ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¾-Ğ·Ğ°-1355E.jpg", "eventUri": null, "sentiment": null, "wgt": 459001711, "relevance": 50}
{"url": "https://therecord.media/tag-100-espionage-hacking-backdoors-asia-pacific", "title": "New hacker group uses open-source tools to spy on entities in Asia-Pacific region", "body": "A newly identified group is targeting \"high-profile\" government and private sector organizations, mostly in the Asia-Pacific region, in a suspected cyberespionage campaign, researchers say.\n\nThe group, tracked as TAG-100, has used open-source remote access tools and exploited various internet-facing devices for initial access.\n\nResearchers at Recorded Future's Insikt Group, who discovered the group, couldn't attribute TAG-100 activity to a specific country, but said that its victim profile aligns with historical targeting by Chinese state-sponsored groups. The Record is an editorially independent unit within Recorded Future.\n\nTAG-100's targets include Asia-Pacific intergovernmental and diplomatic entities, religious organizations in the U.S. and Taiwan, and a political party that has supported an investigation into the treatment of the Uyghur people by the Chinese government.\n\nSince at least February 2024, Insikt Group has identified suspected victims in Cambodia, Djibouti, the Dominican Republic, Fiji, Indonesia, the Netherlands, Taiwan, the U.K, the U.S. and Vietnam.\n\nVictims included industry trade associations as well as political, semiconductor supply-chain, nonprofit and religious organizations across these countries.\n\nAccording to Recorded Future's report, TAG-100 has likely compromised organizations in at least 10 countries in Africa, Asia, North America, South America and Oceania.\n\nFollowing initial access to victims' devices, the hackers employed the backdoors Pantegana and SparkRAT. Both are written in the open-source Go programming language.\n\nPantegana can operate on different operating systems, including Windows, Linux, and macOS. It allows the attackers to gain remote access to infected computers, upload and download files, and gather system information.\n\nPublicly reported use of Pantegana in the wild to date is minimal, researchers said, except for a campaign exploiting a zero-day vulnerability in the Sophos Firewall appliance attributed in 2022 to the suspected Chinese state-sponsored threat activity group DriftingCloud. The group has not been cited publicly by researchers since then.\n\nResearchers found that TAG-100 likely compromised the secretariats of two major Asia-Pacific intergovernmental organizations using the Pantegana backdoor.\n\nResearchers also observed the use of another backdoor, SparkRAT, previously identified by researchers at SentinelOne and Microsoft in 2023. Its memory dump was uploaded to a public malware repository that almost certainly originated from a Djibouti government network likely compromised by TAG-100.\n\nAnother feature of TAG-100 is the exploitation of internet-facing products, including those developed by Citrix, Microsoft, Cisco, Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect, and Fortinet.\n\n\"The widespread availability of open-source tools allows state-sponsored threat actors to outsource certain cyber operations to a broader range of less capable proxy groups or private contractors who may not possess or require in-house development skills due to the widespread availability of open-source tools,\" researchers said.\n\nIt also allows higher-tier groups to refrain from using customized tools during operations in which they are less concerned with being detected or in which heightened attribution obfuscation is desirable, they added.", "source": {"uri": "therecord.media", "dataType": "news", "title": "therecord.media"}, "authors": [], "image": "https://cms.therecord.media/uploads/format_webp/warren_4l_e7_U6c5ek_unsplash_84d80c8b0e.jpg", "eventUri": null, "sentiment": -0.1372549019607843, "wgt": 459001700, "relevance": 26}

{"url": "https://investorplace.com/2024/07/3-reliable-blue-chip-stocks-to-buy-hold-and-never-let-go/", "title": "3 Reliable Blue-Chip Stocks to Buy, Hold and Never Let Go", "body": "Blue-chip stocks are considered to be the most reliable stocks in the industry. Whether you are a beginner or a professional investor, there is nothing like putting your money in blue-chip stocks and holding them long-term. There's a reason why they're called blue-chips, they bring stability to your portfolio due to the solid business structure, stable fundamentals, and growth potential. There are several blue-chip stocks to buy and hold but I've picked the best three.\n\nIdeal for low-risk investors, these three blue chips will generate steady returns over the years. There are minimal chances of losing your money in blue-chip stocks since these are well-established companies that have already proved their worth. I've identified three stocks that will generate steady passive income and impressive capital growth in the coming years. With that in mind, let's take a look at them here.\n\nA top tech stock, Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) has shown steady performance over the years. A highly reliable company, the software giant has a global presence and was one of the first companies to invest in artificial intelligence through OpenAI.\n\nThis gave it an edge over competitors. Since then, it has successfully integrated AI into its products and services and is already enjoying returns. MSFT stock is up 21% year-to-date and 30% in the past 12 months. Exchanging hands for $449, the stock is on its way to $500 and has generated over 200% returns in the past five years. You will never regret owning Microsoft stock.\n\nThe largest company in the world in terms of market cap, Microsoft has consistently beaten the EPS predictions in the past four quarters. A consistent and stable performer, the stock enjoys a dividend yield of 0.78% and there is potential for a dividend hike. The company is expanding, driven by Windows and Office products. It has committed billions of dollars for AI infrastructure in Germany and Japan.\n\nIts third-quarter results showed a 17% year-over-year jump in revenue to $62 billion with the cloud segment growing by 21%. The company is set to announce fourth-quarter results on July 30.\n\nMicrosoft recently launched the Copilot Plus PCs Surface Laptop and Surface Pro tablet. Despite competition in the space, Microsoft remains a dominant player and one of the blue-chip stocks to buy and hold. Multiple catalysts are pushing the stock higher and analysts have a price target of $502 with a buy rating.\n\nAnother player in the AI space, Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG, NASDAQ:GOOGL) is enjoying a strong upward rally. The stock is nearing a 52-week high and exchanging hands for $185, up 32% YTD and 48% in the past 12 months. It reported impressive first-quarter earnings driven by growth in Google Search and ad revenue. I am confident of the long-term success of the stock and consider Alphabet one of the best blue-chip stocks to buy and hold.\n\nAlphabet is in the news for its biggest acquisition ever, the company is close to buying cybersecurity firm Wiz for $23 billion. Wiz offers cloud-based cybersecurity solutions and serves 40% of the Fortune 100 companies. Through this move, Alphabet aims to expand its cloud offering which is already grabbing market share. In the first quarter, the company saw a 28% jump in cloud revenue.\n\nFurther, the company saw a 15% revenue jump and a 57% improvement in the net income. With a market cap of $2.28 trillion, there are strong chances of the company joining the $3 trillion club in the next few years. Google Search holds the largest market share and I believe no competitor will be able to come close to it even if people start using ChatGPT for search. Additionally, if Alphabet manages to use AI to improve its search results and offerings, it could continue market domination.\n\nThe second quarter earnings will show whether Gemini has had any impact on the company's financials. This blue-chip stock could skyrocket in the coming months and is worth holding on to for the long term. When compared to the other Magnificent Seven, it is not an expensive stock.\n\nPharmaceutical company Eli Lilly (NYSE:LLY) has been a hot stock this year. Up 59% YTD, the stock is trading for $941 today and is moving closer to hitting $1,000. This also makes it a top-stock split candidate. It is also an ideal stock if you want to look beyond tech and AI.\n\nEli Lilly is raking in solid revenue driven by the weight-loss drugs, Zepound and Mounjaro. The obesity market is massive and Eli Lilly holds a strong share. In the first quarter, the sales of Mounjaro tripled to $1.81 billion while the sales of Zepbound hit $517 million.\n\nDemand has exceeded the supply of Mounjaro due to which Eli Lilly is investing to grow its capacity and meet the higher demand. The company has invested $9 billion in a new manufacturing plant which is also the largest investment in the history of Eli Lilly. While the new plant will take time to begin the manufacturing process, it will certainly help the company's revenue in the long term.\n\nI am only expecting these numbers to grow faster in the coming quarters. Additionally, its Alzheimer's drug also got FDA approval this month. Eli Lilly is also working on an oral pill for weight loss and has recently agreed to purchase Morphic, a company that develops treatments for chronic diseases for $3.2 billion.\n\nI do not think that the stock has peaked and there is a lot more to come. Eli Lilly could be a great stock to add to your portfolio this year.\n\nOn the date of publication, Vandita Jadeja did not hold (either directly or indirectly) any positions in the securities mentioned in this article. The opinions expressed in this article are those of the writer, subject to the InvestorPlace.com Publishing Guidelines.", "source": {"uri": "investorplace.com", "dataType": "news", "title": "InvestorPlace"}, "authors": [{"uri": "vandita_jadeja@investorplace.com", "name": "Vandita Jadeja", "type": "author", "isAgency": false}], "image": "https://investorplace.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/blue-chip-closeup.jpg", "eventUri": null, "sentiment": 0.3176470588235294, "wgt": 459001349, "relevance": 13}

Il rispetto di tali linee guida ci aiuta a garantire che il sito web sia accessibile a tutte le persone: non vedenti, persone con disabilitÃ  motorie, disabilitÃ  visive, disabilitÃ  cognitive e altro ancora.\n\nQuesto sito utilizza varie tecnologie che hanno lo scopo di renderlo il piÃ¹ accessibile possibile in ogni momento. Utilizziamo un'interfaccia di accessibilitÃ  che consente alle persone con disabilitÃ  specifiche di adattare l'interfaccia utente del sito web (interfaccia utente) e di progettarla in base alle proprie esigenze personali.\n\nInoltre, il sito web utilizza un'applicazione basata sull'intelligenza artificiale che viene eseguita in background e ottimizza costantemente il livello di accessibilitÃ . Questa applicazione corregge l'HTML del sito web, ne adatta le funzionalitÃ  e il comportamento per i lettori di schermo utilizzati dagli utenti non vedenti e per le funzioni della tastiera utilizzate da persone con disabilitÃ  motorie.\n\nSe hai riscontrato un malfunzionamento o hai idee per migliorare, saremo felici di ascoltarti. Puoi contattare lo staff del sito utilizzando la seguente e-mail\n\nIl nostro sito Web implementa la tecnica degli attributi ARIA (Accessible Rich Internet Applications), insieme a vari diversi cambiamenti comportamentali, per garantire che gli utenti non vedenti, che visitano con screen-reader, siano in grado di leggere, comprendere e godere delle funzioni del sito Web. {"url": "https://www.20minutos.es/tecnologia/ciberseguridad/alertan-oleada-robos-facebook-publicidad-difunde-malware-5532687/", "title": "Alertan de una oleada de robos en Facebook a travÃ©s de publicidad que difunde malware", "body": "Cuidado con lo que tiras a la basura: estÃ¡n usando datos de paquetes de envÃ­o para diversos timos\n\nLos investigadores de la compaÃ±Ã­a de ciberseguridad Trustwave advierten sobre una nueva campaÃ±a de publicidad maliciosa en Facebook que utiliza anuncios llamativos como gancho para descargar 'juegos' y 'software', de esta manera, los ciberdelincuentes introducen el malware SYS01 en los dispositivos de las vÃ­ctimas con el objetivo de robar informaciÃ³n y secuestrar cuentas.\n\nDicho malware extrae datos del navegador, credenciales de inicio de sesiÃ³n, datos del historial y cookies; se basa, normalmente, en archivos Zip maliciosos disfrazados con contenido para adultos; fue descubierto por primera vez por la compaÃ±Ã­a Morphisec en noviembre de 2022; y, en esta nueva campaÃ±a, los estafadores han modificado su contenido para llamar la atenciÃ³n con anuncios que llegan a mÃ¡s usuarios de forma general.\n\nEl modus operandi del malware SYS01 consiste en promocionar anuncios falsos a travÃ©s de pÃ¡ginas de Facebook, ya sea creadas para esta tarea o mediante el secuestro de pÃ¡ginas previamente existentes.\n\nToda esta falsa publicidad se utiliza como reclamo para engaÃ±ar a los usuarios y conseguir que descarguen el malware, ademÃ¡s, para ello, promocionan asuntos de interÃ©s general, como, por ejemplo, los temas escritorio para Windows, la descarga de juegos, programas de ediciÃ³n o herramientas con inteligencia artificial (IA).\n\nEn caso de que la vÃ­ctima haga clic en el anuncio, llega a una pÃ¡gina web alojada en Google Sites o True Hosting donde, supuestamente, debe descargar el contenido ofertado en el anuncio. Sin embargo, lo que descarga realmente es un archivo ZIP con el nombre del elemento del anuncio. DespuÃ©s, dicho archivo descarga el malware SYSO1, que utiliza ejecutables DLL, scripts de PowerSell y scripts PHP para instalar el virus informÃ¡tico y robar datos del dispositivo donde se haya instalado.\n\nEl objetivo principal de este malware consiste en obtener los tokens de acceso para las cuentas de Facebook, asÃ­ pues, los ciberdelincuentes pueden robar y suplantar aquellos perfiles que son comerciales para utilizar su base de clientela para propagar aÃºn mÃ¡s el virus informÃ¡tico.\n\nPor otro lado, el malware tambiÃ©n se centra en el robo de las cookies de Facebook en el dispositivo, con las que extrae informaciÃ³n personal del perfil, el correo electrÃ³nico, la fecha de nacimiento y mÃ©todos de pago.\n\nTras extraer todos estos datos, los ciberdelincuentes almacenan la informaciÃ³n para, posteriormente, intentar filtrarlas y venderlas a otros estafadores.", "source": {"uri": "20minutos.es", "dataType": "news", "title": "20 minutos"}, "authors": [], "image": "https://imagenes.20minutos.es/files/image_1920_1080/uploads/imagenes/2022/05/18/logo-facebook.jpeg", "eventUri": "spa-3548499", "sentiment": null, "wgt": 459000942, "relevance": 13}
{"url": "https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-tips/can-iphone-users-make-a-phone-call-from-a-windows-pc/articleshow/111838350.cms", "title": "Can iPhone users make a phone call from a Windows PC? | - Times of India", "body": "Discover how iPhone users can now connect their smartphones to Windows PCs to make calls and send messages using the Microsoft Phone Link app. Follow the simple steps outlined to ensure a smooth calling experience between your iPhone and Windows PC.iPhone users have the capability to connect their smartphones to a Windows PC or laptop to make calls and send messages. This functionality is possible through the Microsoft Phone Link app. Historically, Apple has maintained a closed ecosystem, enabling seamless interconnectivity primarily between iPhones, Macs, and iPads. However, with this integration, iPhone users can enjoy a similar level of connectivity with Windows PCs, provided the system is running on Windows 11 OS.\n\nEnsure you are logged into your Microsoft account on both your iPhone and Windows PC.Activate Bluetooth on both devices, as this connection is crucial for making phone calls from your PC.\n\nGo to the App Store on your iPhone and look for the 'Link to Windows' app. Install the app on your iPhone.\n\nThe Phone Link app comes pre-installed for Windows 11 users. Access it by navigating to the Start menu on your Windows PC, searching for the 'Phone Link' app, and launching it. If you cannot find the app, go to 'Settings' and search for 'Phone Link'. Enable it to start the download. After downloading, open the app from Settings by selecting 'Open Phone Link'. Alternatively, you can download the Phone Link app from this webpage.\n\nIn the Phone Link window on your Windows PC, select 'iPhone'. Follow the prompts on your iPhone to pair it with your Windows PC via Bluetooth.\n\nEnsure the pairing process is complete by following the on-screen instructions. Once paired, select 'Calls'.\n\nEnsure your iPhone is connected to your Windows PC via Bluetooth.\n\nEnter the contact number of the person you want to call. Ensure your iPhone remains within the Bluetooth range of your Windows PC for a smooth calling experience.\n\nAlso Read | 8 ways to take a screenshot in Microsoft Windows", "source": {"uri": "timesofindia.indiatimes.com", "dataType": "news", "title": "The Times of India"}, "authors": [{"uri": "deeksha_somani@timesofindia.indiatimes.com", "name": "Deeksha Somani", "type": "author", "isAgency": false}], "image": "https://static.toiimg.com/thumb/msid-111838463,width-1070,height-580,imgsize-10628,resizemode-75,overlay-toi_sw,pt-32,y_pad-40/photo.jpg", "eventUri": "eng-9736998", "sentiment": 0.1294117647058823, "wgt": 459000935, "relevance": 50}
